cause.description:
Old people who drive 10 below the limit, asians, women, foreigners, douchebags who feel the need to show off that generic V6 Camaro or Mustang... all of these people suck, and should die. It is my right as an American to drive however the fuck crazy I want, and that happens to be quite crazy indeed; if you can't play with the big boys, than go shuffle on down the sidewalk like a mongoloid bitch.
1. The speed limit should be 65 or higher, everywhere
2. Individuals found guilty of slow-ass driving are to be hung by the neck until dead
3. Anyone who yells, shouts, or gestures at me for expressing my velocital passion shall be tortured
cause.mission: Remove unnecessarily slow drivers from the nation's highways
cause.name: Fuck Slow Drivers!
